column4: I want to copy files from Ubuntu to MacOSX. I've opened a terminal window on the mac and typed "ssh ubuntuusername@192.168.1.68", authenticated and logged in to the ubuntu machine. Now I have navigated to the directory on the ubuntu machine containing the files I want... what do I typer to copy them to the mac? e.g. "cp filename.com <something meaning location of the mac's folder>" I don't know what to type in the <> br
